note.p: Career: Mahendralal Sircar Research Professor of Physics

Signature in Charter Book appears in 1946, together with Birbal Sahni and Prasanto Mahalanobis, who attended the Royal Society for an extraordinary meeting on 18 July 1946 organized by the Society for the purpose of admitting Foreign and other Members elected in recent years as part of the Newton Tercentenary Clebrations
Obituaries: Biographical Memoirs of Fellows of the Royal Society 1967 vol 13 pp 245-255, plate, by Kathleen Lonsdale and H J Bhabha
References: D C V Mallik, 'The Raman Effect and Krishnan's Diary' in NR 2000 vol 54 pp 67-83, plate
J C D Brand, 'The Discovery of the Raman Effect' in NR 1989 vol 43 pp 1-23
R Singh and F Riess, 'The nobel laureate Sir Chandrasekhara Venkata Raman FRS and his contacts with the British Scientific community in a social and political context' in NR 2004 vol 58 pp 47-64
